item.title: C++ Working
item.description: I was just learning about the C++ fundamentals from The Cherno C++ playlist and thought of making notes on it. Added reference at the bottom. What’s cmake? CMake is an open-source, cross-platform build system generator. It doesn’t build software directly—it generates build files (like Makefiles, Ninja build files, or Visual Studio project files) based on the instructions you give it in CMakeLists.txt. cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.5) project (HelloWorld) set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -Wall -Werror -std=c++14") set (source_dir "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/") file(GLOB source_files "${source_dir}/*.
